abstract: As the World Series rests between Games 5 and 6, the Red Sox and the Cubs will introduce their new general managers and the Angels will keep shopping for one.
snippet: As the World Series rests between Games 5 and 6, the Red Sox and the Cubs will introduce their new general managers and the Angels will keep shopping for one.
lead_paragraph: ARLINGTON, Tex. - Hal Steinbrenner, the Yankees' managing general partner, met with General Manager Brian Cashman at Yankee Stadium on Monday as negotiations to extend Cashman's contract intensified. It was only one of several important developments in baseball away from the World Series.

headline.main: From Boston to Chicago to Los Angeles, Baseball's Hot Stove Is Heating Up
